name: JellyPlug Repository
description: Repository manifest for the JellyPlug branding plugin.

plugins.name: JellyPlug
plugins.overview: Brand and customize the Jellyfin web UI with backgrounds, logos, colors, footers, menus, and injected scripts.
plugins.description: Provides configurable branding assets (backgrounds, logos, accent and neutral colors) plus footer, menu, and JavaScript injection for Jellyfin without patching the upstream UI.

versions.changelog: Initial release of JellyPlug branding tools.
